TopicTitle: Analog Throttle response while in Map screen.

Articles.Content:
KSP Version: build id = 00705 2014-12-15_13-42-05 Branch: master

Platform: Windows 7 64 bit, Thrustmaster T.Flight Hotas X analog controller

Issue: When changing analog throttle input on the Map screen, the change is not registered until switching back to the main screen.

To replicate: Launch at full throttle, begin gravity turn and switch to Map screen. Reduce or cut throttle.

Result: Engine sound and Throttle level will not change until switching back out of the Map screen.

Do you have the nav ball up in the map mode? The throttle and steering commands don't work if the nav ball is minimized.

Welcome to the forums!

Cheers,

~Claw
